attributes.description:
Unique to GM of Canada is the GM Cold Weather Development Centre in Kapuskasing, Ontario, where current and future General Motors products undergo testing, reliability and performance studies in severe climatic conditions.

Kapuskasing is an ideal cold weather test site with a consistent low temperature profile, (typically over 2.5 meters of snow falls each year with temperatures falling below -30 degrees Centigrade). This small, hospitable, northern community is located 750 miles north of Detroit, and provides testing services to GM's North American and overseas operations.
attributes.address: 204 Government Rd W, Kapuskasing, ON P5N, Canada
attributes.title: Cold Weather Development Centre

attributes.description: The Oshawa Service Parts Operations provides support for the Canadian Parts Distribution Centres and delivers GM parts and products to nearly 850 Dealers and AC Delco distributors across Canada.

attributes.title: Canadian Headquarters, General Motors

attributes.description: Covering 587,000 square feet, the Oshawa Metal Centre in Oshawa produces over 80,000 parts a day, consumers 337 tons of steel a day and produces 22 million parts a year for the Oshawa Car Assembly Centre and other corporate customers.
attributes.address: Park Rd S, Oshawa, ON L1J, Canada
attributes.title: Oshawa Metal Centre

attributes.description:
The Oshawa Assembly Plant has two production lines; The Flex Line and The Consolidated Line.

The flex line builds the Chevrolet Camaro, Camaro Convertible, Camaro ZL1 and the Buick Regal, Regal eAssist, Regal GS and the all-new Cadillac XTS.

The consolidated line assembles the Chevrolet Impala and Equinox.

Oshawa Assembly Plant is also a manufacturing location for the all-new Chevrolet Impala 
starting in 2013.
attributes.title: Oshawa Car Plant, Assembly Plant

attributes.description:
The St. Catharines Engine Plant machines parts and assembles GM's famous Vortec brand of 
engines. The plant currently assembles the Gen IV V8 engine, the High Feature V6 Engine, and 
the GF6. The V8 engine powers the Chevrolet Corvette and the Chevrolet Camaro. The high 
feature V6 powers the Chevrolet Camaro and Traverse.

As well, various machined components supporting both engine and transmission assembly are 
manufactured.
attributes.title: Oshawa Metal Centre to St.Catherines Powertrain

attributes.description: Parts Distribution Centres are warehousing facilities responsible for the movement of material to and from the dealerships. They handle the shipment of material to dealerships as well as the return of damaged material to the supplier base.
attributes.title: Service, Parts Operations (SPO) to Parts Distribution Centre
